turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi! I’d like to order a pizza please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. can I get your phone number,your name and your address?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: okay sure, this is my address i send

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What can I get for ya?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Um, I think that we’d like just one large pizza. Um half pineapple and cheese, and then half pepparoni. Can you guys do that?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure can! Anything else I can do for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah. Do you have any specials right now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Um, unfortunately none with just a single pizza. Right now our specials are the two medium, two topping pizzas

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: how much its cost?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: um, for $14.95… and the two large, two topping pizzas for $17.95.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh you know what? Let’s do the two mediums. Okay?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. So do you want one like, pineapple and one pepparoni?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You got it! Are you guys busy today?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Uh, we will be. I got a very large order coming up so

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh my gosh! Well good luck!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: There we go. $14.95, and we’ll see you in about thirty-five minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks a lot!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thanks for choosing Dominos

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright, bye

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: welcome
